hero.subtitle: We design and ship custom electronics: PCB design, firmware, and connected products. From idea to tested prototypes.

intro.p1: TES (Tröndle Embedded System) is a small Swiss embedded design studio run by Nicolas Tröndle. We help turn ideas into solid, working hardware by handling everything from PCB design to firmware and real-world testing.
intro.p2: We've worked with ESP32, RP2040, and STM32 platforms, across CAN, USB, and Wi-Fi projects, with a strong focus on power and thermal constraints. Our approach is practical and detail-oriented: clean schematics, layouts that are easy to manufacture, and software that behaves reliably outside the lab.
